thread.title: BRIEF-Advanced Disposal Services Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.47

title: BRIEF-Advanced Disposal Services Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.47
text: February 22, 2018 / 9:37 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Advanced Disposal Services Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.47 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Advanced Disposal Services Inc: * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 9.2 PERCENT TO $384.4 MILLION * FISCAL YEAR 2018 REVENUE IS ESTIMATED TO BE BETWEEN $1,545 MILLION AND $1,565 MILLION * FISCAL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IS ESTIMATED TO BE BETWEEN $426 MILLION AND $436 MILLION * FISCAL YEAR 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE ESTIMATED TO BE BETWEEN $184 MILLION AND $194 MILLION. * FISCAL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED FREE CASH FLOW IS ESTIMATED TO BE BETWEEN $134 MILLION AND $144 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.14, REVENUE VIEW $374.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.57 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ADVANCED DISPOSAL SERVICES SAYS NET INCOME FOR Q4 WAS AIDED IN PART BY $40.4 MILLION TAX IMPACT FROM TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT - SEC FILING Source: ( bit.ly/2EYuuyY ) Further company coverage:
